project.name: BOM (Bill of Materials) Dependencies
project.description: Dependency Management this includes 1. POM dependency management for 3rd-party maven-controlled builds these are prefixed with dependency-* 2. Third party source code if the third party is not "mavenified" then it can be more convenient to self-compile source code into a JAR file with a custom POM. Jenkins CI tends to have trouble with locally installed JARs at the moment and while this approach might seem like more work than just taking a JAR it makes working with Jenkins *much* easier
